mapper.select: select bu.buyer_id, tr.purchase_no, bu.talent_no, tr.refund_bamboo, tr.issue, tr.status, tr.approve_date from talent_refund tr, bamboo_use bu where tr.purchase_no = bu.purchase_no and tr.status = '검토중'
mapper.update: update talent_refund set status = #{status}, approve_date = sysdate where purchase_no in #{purchaseNo}
